name: A Step Outside
description:
There are many benefits to living in a haunted house. Presumably. Maybe? This game isn't about that. It's about calming the spirits of your spectral housemates so that you can actually go out on that trip you've been preparing for. It's about other stuff too. Presumably. Maybe? Art engagement is interpretive you're smart you'll figure something out.

Controls: ⬆⬇➡⬅ to move/advance dialogue.
On mobile: swipe to move, tap to advance dialogue.

Made in Bitsy with Borksy for Bitsy Jam #66: Ghosts on Holiday.
